Key Match Events: New Zealand was bowled out for 90, their eighth lowest in a completed innings in men's T20Is
Shadab Khan picked up two wickets, including that of Ish Sodhi with an unusual lbw
The ball pitched extremely short on leg stump, holding its line and striking Sodhi on the hip
Miscellaneous Highlights: All of Pakistan's bowlers finished with excellent figures; none of them had economy rates above seven runs per over
The Pakistan fielders were in hysterics after Shadab Khan's lbw was overturned
